member.name: NSTCCUSTOMDRAW
member.summary: Custom draw structure used by methods.

member.name: NSTCCUSTOMDRAW.psi
member.summary: A pointer to a Shell item.

member.name: NSTCCUSTOMDRAW.uItemState
member.summary: The current item state. See for more detail.

member.name: NSTCCUSTOMDRAW.nstcis
member.summary: The state of a tree item. See .

member.name: NSTCCUSTOMDRAW.pszText
member.summary: A pointer to a null-terminated Unicode string that contains the item text, if the structure specifies item attributes.

member.name: NSTCCUSTOMDRAW.iImage
member.summary: The index in the tree-view control's image list.

member.name: NSTCCUSTOMDRAW.himl
member.summary: A handle to an image list.

member.name: NSTCCUSTOMDRAW.iLevel
member.summary: The zero-based level of the item being drawn.
